head.supplied: Melbourne botanic Garden, ¶ 15 May 65 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you, that I intend to proceed tomorrow to Echuca with a view of arranging if possible for the transplantation of some useful...

div.p: M65/4402, unit 101, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to inform you, that I intend to proceed tomorrow to Echuca with a view of arranging if possible for the transplantation of some useful plants for experimental purposes to the Murray River. It is my intention to return on Thursday.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: your most obedient and humble servant

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
